Title: The Mattress
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Laura McCreary, Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake and Amy work together on a case, and wind up arguing over Jake's old, worn-out mattress. Meanwhile, Boyle scratches Holt's prized car, and the teenage boy Rosa sponsors as a "big brother" is in trouble with the law.
